name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Smoke Trouble
description:
Made with GB studio.

Controls (click on the game window so they become enabled):

X (keyboard) works as Gameboy's A button 

Z (keyboard) works as Gameboy's B button 

Q (keyboard) works as Gameboy's START button

W (keyboard) works as Gameboy's SELECT button

 Fan made game based on the Tiny Toon Adventures franchise, without financial gain

 Tiny Toon Adventures, characters, names, and all related indicia are trademarks of Warner Bros © 2020
